item.title: 美联储警示与办公空间和资本规划相关的潜在风险
item.description: 美联储银行监管人员正在对社区银行和地区银行的商业房地产投资组合进行监控，因为他们担心 "利率上升、承保标准收紧以及商业房地产价值下降"。【原文：Federal Reserve bank supervisors are monitoring community and regional banks’ commercial real estate portfolios amid concerns over “elevated interest rates, tighter underwriting standards, and lower commercial property values,” the agency said.】

item.title: 英国央行行长格林称需要更多就业疲软支持降息
item.description: 英格兰银行决策者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，劳动力市场需要进一步疲软，她才能支持再次降息。【原文：Bank of England policymaker Megan Greene said the labor market needs to weaken further before she can back another interest-rate reduction.】

item.title: 秘鲁通胀升幅低于预期助推降息前景
item.description: 秘鲁首都利马 11 月份的通胀率增幅低于预期，这增加了秘鲁央行在连续两个月维持利率不变后下调利率的可能性。【原文：Inflation in Peruvian capital Lima rose less than expected in November, boosting chances that the central bank could cut interest rates after holding them unchanged for two straight months.】

item.title: 美国称预言欺诈案可能涉及机密信息
item.description: 美国检察官表示，针对预言资产管理公司（Prophecy Asset Management）共同所有人杰弗里-斯帕茨（Jeffrey Spotts）投资者损失 3 亿美元的欺诈案可能涉及机密信息，同时要求将定于 1 月份进行的审判推迟至少两个月。【原文：The fraud case against Prophecy Asset Management co-owner Jeffrey Spotts over $300 million in investor losses may involve classified information, US prosecutors said while seeking a delay of at least two months in a trial set for January.】

item.title: 迪斯尼寻求能源交易商，大公司努力降低电力成本
item.description: 随着大公司在控制能源成本方面越来越精明，华特迪士尼公司正在寻找一名能源交易员。【原文：Walt Disney Co. is looking for an energy trader as major corporations grow more shrewd about controlling their energy costs.】

item.title: 海湾能源公司获得肯尼亚对图洛公司前油田的减税优惠
item.description: 一家能源贸易公司收购了图洛石油公司（Tullow Oil Plc）在东非国家的区块，肯尼亚同意给予该公司税收减免，并允许提高回收成本，以加快该项目开发进度，该项目计划于明年投产。【原文：Kenya agreed to grant tax breaks and allow higher recovery costs to an energy trading firm that acquired Tullow Oil Plc’s blocks in the East African country to accelerate development of the project whose output is planned for next year.】

item.title: 西班牙要求电信公司建立备份以避免停机
item.description: 西班牙政府将强制要求西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）和 Cellnex Telecom SA 等当地电信公司安装备用电源系统，以确保在发生重大灾难时提供电话和互联网服务。【原文：Spain’s government is set to mandate that local telecommunications firms such as Telefónica SA and Cellnex Telecom SA install power backup systems to ensure phone and internet services during major disasters.】

item.title: 牙买加获得 67 亿美元资金用于飓风后重建
item.description: 牙买加从多边贷款机构获得了为期三年、总额达 67 亿美元的一揽子融资计划，以帮助在一场破坏性飓风之后的重建工作，这场飓风摧毁了关键的基础设施、工业和住宅。【原文：Jamaica secured a three-year financing package from multilateral lenders totaling $6.7 billion to help rebuild following a devastating hurricane that damaged key infrastructure, industry and homes.】

item.title: 尼日利亚第三季度经济增长快于预期
item.description: 尼日利亚第三季度的经济增长速度略高于预期。【原文：Nigeria’s economy grew at a slightly faster pace than expected in the third quarter.】

item.title: DeepSeek 推出新的人工智能模型，与谷歌和 OpenAI 竞争
item.description: 中国的 DeepSeek 公司推出了其几周前发布的人工智能实验模型的两个新版本，增加了新的功能。【原文：China’s DeepSeek unveiled two new versions of an experimental artificial-intelligence model it released weeks ago, adding fresh capabilities the startup said would help with combining reasoning and executing certain actions autonomously.】

item.title: 加纳正在培训其贷款人以拓展伊斯兰银行服务
item.description: 加纳中央银行正在采取措施，鼓励提供符合伊斯兰法的金融服务，并为其贷款人提供无息银行原则方面的培训。【原文：Ghana’s central bank is taking steps to encourage the provision of financial services that are compliant with Islamic law and is offering its lenders training in non-interest banking principles.】

item.title: OpenAI 参股 Thrive Holdings，为循环交易添砖加瓦
item.description: OpenAI 正在参股 Thrive 控股公司（Thrive Holdings），后者是 Thrive Capital 今年早些时候成立的一家投资机构。【原文：OpenAI is taking an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, an investment vehicle set up earlier this year by Thrive Capital, adding to a growing list of circular deals involving the ChatGPT maker and its backers.】

item.title: 红杉押注人工智能初创公司，以减轻财富顾问的繁重工作
item.description: 许多公司都在试图用人工智能取代财富顾问，但马克-斯旺（Mark Swan）打赌，人类将继续存在。【原文：Many companies are trying to replace wealth advisers with artificial intelligence, but Mark Swan’s bet is that humans are here to stay.】

item.title: 美国工厂活动创四个月来最大降幅
item.description: 由于订单减少，11 月份美国工厂活动出现了四个月来最大程度的萎缩，这表明制造商正努力摆脱长期以来的萎靡不振。【原文：US factory activity shrank in November by the most in four months as orders weakened, indicating manufacturers are struggling to break free from an extended period of malaise.】

item.title: 加密货币跌势加深，美股下滑，日本央行暗示政策转向
item.description: 进入 12 月份后，美国股市情绪谨慎，受到加密货币再次下滑以及日本央行发出可能很快收紧政策的信号后债券收益率上升的压力。【原文：US stocks entered December in a cautious mood, pressured by a renewed slide in cryptocurrencies and rising bond yields after the Bank of Japan signaled it may soon tighten its policy.】

item.title: 首席财务官称，KKR 旗下 Avida 将首款 SRT 出售给信贷公司 Sona
item.description: 首席财务官 Lennart Erlandson 表示，由 KKR & Co Inc.控制的瑞典贷款公司 Avida Finans AB 已将其首笔重大风险转移交易出售给索纳资产管理公司。【原文：Avida Finans AB, a Swedish lender controlled by KKR & Co Inc., sold its inaugural significant risk transfer transaction to Sona Asset Management, Chief Financial Officer Lennart Erlandson said.】

item.title: 稳定币公司 First Digital 着眼于通过 SPAC 合并上市
item.description: 随着加密货币公司利用更有利的法规在股票市场上市，First Digital Group 正计划通过与一家空白支票公司合并的方式上市。【原文：First Digital Group is planning to go public by merging with a blank-check company, as crypto firms take advantage of more favorable regulations to list their shares on stock markets.】

item.title: 亿万富翁佩拉多再次收购加拿大泛航航空公司
item.description: 魁北克亿万富翁皮埃尔-卡尔-佩拉多（Pierre Karl Péladeau）正在推动对度假服务提供商 Transat AT 公司董事会的部分控制，称该公司需要进行重大变革，以扭转其股价并修复其资产负债表。【原文：Quebec billionaire Pierre Karl Péladeau is pushing for partial control of the board of vacation provider Transat AT Inc., saying the company needs major changes to turn around its share price and fix its balance sheet.】

item.title: 特朗普关税打击出口，印度经常账户缺口扩大
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收 50%的关税损害了印度的出口，印度 7 月至 9 月季度的经常账户赤字有所扩大。【原文：India’s current account deficit widened in the July–to-September quarter as US President Donald Trump’s 50% tariff hurt the country’s exports.】

item.title: Nvidia 购买芯片软件制造商 Synopsys 20 亿美元股票
item.description: Nvidia 公司向芯片设计软件制造商 Synopsys 公司的股票投资了 20 亿美元，作为工程与设计合作伙伴关系的一部分。【原文：Nvidia Corp. has invested $2 billion into chip-design software maker Synopsys Inc.’s stock as part of an engineering and design partnership.】

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局誓言实施新疫苗要求后，Moderna 公司业绩下滑
item.description: 食品药品管理局在上周末的一份备忘录中表示，将对哪些疫苗上市做出新的限制，Moderna 公司在周一盘前交易中下跌。【原文：Moderna Inc. fell in premarket trading Monday after the Food and Drug Administration said in a memo late last week it would place new restrictions on which vaccines hit the market.】

item.title: 津巴布韦顶级金矿商警告提高特许权使用费将打击利润
item.description: 卡利多尼亚矿业公司（Caledonia Mining Corp.【原文：Caledonia Mining Corp. said a proposal by Zimbabwe’s government to double the royalty on gold producers would curb its profits.】

item.title: Targa 拟以 12.5 亿美元收购竞争对手二叠纪管道运营商
item.description: 天然气管道运营商 Targa Resources Corp. 达成协议，将以 12.5 亿美元现金收购规模较小的竞争对手 Stakeholder Midstream。【原文：Natural gas pipeline operator Targa Resources Corp. reached a deal to buy smaller rival Stakeholder Midstream for $1.25 billion in cash.】

item.title: 澳大利亚小麦产量展望上调至历史第三高水平
item.description: 澳大利亚预计将在本季收获有史以来第三大小麦作物，这很可能会加剧这种重要谷物的全球供应过剩。【原文：Australia is expecting to harvest its third-largest wheat crop on record in the current season, likely exacerbating a global supply glut of the important grain.】

item.title: 网络星期一电子游戏价格揭示了特朗普关税的威力
item.description: 讨价还价的游戏玩家可能会对网络星期一的微薄折扣感到失望，这揭示了唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税如何影响了圣诞树下的包装和摆放。【原文：Bargain-hunting gamers will likely be disappointed by meager Cyber Monday discounts, revealing how President Donald Trump’s tariffs are influencing what gets wrapped up and placed beneath Christmas trees.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利罗德称韩元最糟糕的时期可能已经过去
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师詹姆斯-洛德（James Lord）认为，由于即将到来的美国降息恰逢韩国宽松政策周期的结束，韩元可能会很快企稳，甚至扭转近期的部分跌势。【原文：The won could soon stabilize and even reverse some of its recent slide, as upcoming US interest-rate cuts coincide with the end of South Korea’s policy-easing cycle, according to Morgan Stanley strategist James Lord.】

item.title: 印度沙漠之邦重启燃煤发电辩论
item.description: 具有竞争力的电池成本正在使清洁能源成为该国部分地区煤炭的可行替代品。【原文：The competitive cost of batteries is making clean energy a viable alternative to coal in parts of the country.】

item.title: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂每月供应 15 亿升燃油
item.description: 尼日利亚丹格特炼油厂承诺，在一月份进行小规模维护期间，每月至少为国内市场供应 15 亿升汽油。【原文：Nigeria’s Dangote Refinery pledged to produce a minimum monthly supply of 1.5 billion liters of gasoline for the domestic market through January as minor maintenance is conducted.】

item.title: 巴里克探索在动荡中对北美黄金资产进行首次公开募股
item.description: 巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp. ）正在探索对其北美黄金资产进行首次公开募股，这家加拿大矿业公司正在努力应对一段时期的动荡，包括采矿挫折和管理层变动。【原文：Barrick Mining Corp. is exploring an initial public offering of its North American gold assets as the Canadian miner grapples with a period of upheaval including mining setbacks and management changes.】

item.title: 英伟达的人工智能优势受到泡沫信奉者的冲击
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）评估了围绕芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）的人工智能泡沫。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King assesses the angst about an AI bubble swirling around chipmaker Nvidia.】
